## ProductPrice interface

Represents a product price.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductPrice 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [discount?](./magento-api.productprice.discount.md) | Maybe&lt;[ProductDiscount](./magento-api.productdiscount.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price discount. Represents the difference between the regular and final price. |
|  [final\_price](./magento-api.productprice.final_price.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The final price of the product after discounts applied. |
|  [fixed\_product\_taxes?](./magento-api.productprice.fixed_product_taxes.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[FixedProductTax](./magento-api.fixedproducttax.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The multiple FPTs that can be applied to a product price. |
|  [regular\_price](./magento-api.productprice.regular_price.md) | [Money](./magento-api.money.md) | The regular price of the product. |
